## addIcon() function

Adds an icon to the library

**Signature:**

```typescript
export function addIcon(iconId: string, svgContent: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  iconId | string | the icon ID |
|  svgContent | string | the content of the SVG. |

**Returns:**

void
